PAYMENT_WINDOW_MINUTES.description: The time in minutes a user has to complete payment before their ticket is cancelled.

MAX_TICKET_CLEANUP_BATCH_SIZE.description: Maximum number of expired tickets to process in a single cleanup job.

ENABLE_EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS.description: Whether to send email notifications for ticket updates.

MAX_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS.description: Maximum failed login attempts before account lockout.

SESSION_TIMEOUT_MINUTES.description: Session timeout in minutes for inactive users.

ENABLE_GUEST_BOOKING.description: Whether to allow guest users to book tickets without registration.

TICKET_RESERVATION_MINUTES.description: Time in minutes a seat is reserved after selection before expiry.

CHANGE_PASSWORD_EXPIRY_HOURS.description: Hours before a password reset link expires.

VERIFICATION_TOKEN_EXPIRY_HOURS.description: Hours before an email verification token expires.

BCRYPT_SALT_ROUNDS.description: Number of salt rounds for bcrypt password hashing.

CLEANUP_CRON_EXPRESSION.description: Cron expression for recurring ticket cleanup jobs (every 5 minutes).

JWT_EXPIRY_HOURS.description: Hours before JWT access tokens expire.

REFRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRY_HOURS.description: Hours before refresh tokens expire (30 days = 720 hours).
